<h3 id="X38150">X(38150) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(7), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-(b+c)*a^5-2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b-c)^4*a^2+3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38150) = X(3)+2*X(18482) = 2*X(3)-5*X(20195) = X(4)+2*X(142) = 2*X(4)+X(5732) = 4*X(5)-X(9) = 8*X(5)+X(5735) = 2*X(5)+X(5805) = X(7)+5*X(3091) = 2*X(9)+X(5735) = X(9)+2*X(5805) = X(9)+4*X(38137) = 4*X(142)-X(5732) = 2*X(5715)+X(5833) = X(5735)-4*X(5805) = X(5735)+4*X(38108) = X(5735)-8*X(38137) = 4*X(18482)+5*X(20195) = X(24644)-5*X(30308) = X(38037)+2*X(38151) = X(38108)+2*X(38137)</b>
<p>X(38150) lies on these lines: {1,6835}, {2,165}, {3,18482}, {4,142}, {5,9}, {7,1210}, {30,38093}, {40,3826}, {57,8226}, {78,11522}, {119,3254}, {144,5068}, {355,3243}, {381,971}, {390,9614}, {411,3624}, {515,38053}, {517,38200}, {518,5587}, {527,3545}, {528,38021}, {546,31657}, {547,38113}, {920,1445}, {936,946}, {938,5290}, {954,5219}, {990,4859}, {1001,3149}, {1478,4321}, {1479,4326}, {1490,6849}, {1503,38186}, {1656,31658}, {1698,6991}, {1750,5249}, {2801,37718}, {2829,38205}, {2951,6836}, {3008,3332}, {3062,6870}, {3086,12573}, {3090,5759}, {3306,10883}, {3339,12617}, {3358,6841}, {3586,6839}, {3832,36991}, {3845,38111}, {3847,5880}, {3851,5779}, {3855,36996}, {4292,8732}, {4357,36660}, {4654,5927}, {5056,18230}, {5066,5843}, {5071,21168}, {5223,6734}, {5436,20420}, {5437,8727}, {5528,10738}, {5603,5853}, {5691,6894}, {5698,6855}, {5703,30331}, {5704,30424}, {5714,9842}, {5728,9581}, {5733,16667}, {5750,36682}, {5785,6843}, {5809,30275}, {5818,24393}, {5842,38206}, {5845,38145}, {5850,38158}, {5851,38159}, {5852,38160}, {5856,38152}, {5857,38153}, {5905,30326}, {6282,6854}, {6601,6765}, {6622,7717}, {6766,9710}, {6830,8257}, {6837,15803}, {6846,31424}, {6865,18483}, {6918,9955}, {6945,8545}, {6957,30379}, {7385,10444}, {7548,10394}, {7679,31434}, {7741,15299}, {7951,15298}, {7958,31435}, {7965,10860}, {8068,15518}, {8544,13729}, {8581,10895}, {9624,33597}, {9843,12571}, {10157,28609}, {10172,38130}, {10175,38057}, {10431,10857}, {10436,36652}, {10826,18412}, {10861,17577}, {10893,17668}, {10896,14100}, {11230,38031}, {12047,12560}, {12436,37434}, {12618,25590}, {12649,37714}, {13329,31183}, {13374,15185}, {13727,17282}, {14269,38065}, {15699,38067}, {15933,28236}, {16189,20013}, {17529,37551}, {18492,25557}, {19541,25525}, {23046,38080}, {29016,29573}, {37447,37526}, {38042,38126}</p>
<p>
X(38150) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 21151}, {5, 38137}, {381, 38107}, {1699, 38052}, {3545, 38073}, {3817, 38151}, {3845, 38111}, {5587, 38036}, {5603, 38149}, {5805, 38108}, {10516, 38143}, {14269, 38065}, {23046, 38080}<br>
X(38150) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (9, 38108), (5732, 21151), (5805, 38137), (6173, 38107), (21151, 142), (21153, 2), (38031, 11230), (38037, 3817), (38057, 10175), (38059, 10171), (38067, 15699), (38075, 3545), (38108, 5), (38113, 547), (38122, 38171), (38126, 38042), (38130, 10172), (38139, 5066), (38154, 5587)<br>
X(38150) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 142, 5732), (5, 5805, 9), (9, 5805, 5735), (355, 20330, 3243), (546, 31657, 31672), (946, 6864, 936), (1656, 31671, 31658), (3090, 5759, 6666), (38122, 38171, 38093)<br>
</p>
